price: 28. Waxaan ahayn horey kuwa barya Alle (Keliya).Waa Baarriga, Naxariista Badan.
arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā kunnā min qablu nadʿūhu innahu huwa al-baru al-raḥīmu
